trans-unit.source: Use POP3 instead of IMAP.
trans-unit.target: Mampiasa POP3 raha tokony ho IMAP.

trans-unit.source: Create a new product: CTRL+P
trans-unit.target: Mamorona entana vaovao: CTRL+P

trans-unit.source: Enter your product name
trans-unit.target: Ampidiro ny anaran'ny entanao

trans-unit.source:
The summary is a short sentence describing your product.
It will appears at the top of your shop's product page, in product lists, and in search engines' results page (so it's important for SEO). To give more details about your product, use the "Description" tab.
trans-unit.target:
Ny famintinana dia fehezan-teny fohy mamaritra ny entanao.
Izany dia hiseho amin'ny faritra ambonin'ny pejy entan'ny fivarotanao, anatin'ny lisitry ny entana, ary amin'ny pejy valin'ny maotera fitadiavana (noho izany dia zava-dehibe hoan'ny SEO). Mba hanomezana antsipirihany misimisy, mampiasà ny vakizoro "Famaritana".

trans-unit.source: Use a comma to create separate tags. E.g.: dress, cotton, party dresses.
trans-unit.target: Mampiasà faingo hanasarahana tenifototra. Oh.: akanjo, vovo, akanjom-pety.

trans-unit.source: Per kilo, per litre
trans-unit.target: Isa-kilao, isa-litatra

trans-unit.source: Combine several attributes, e.g.: "Size: all", "Color: red".
trans-unit.target: Manambatra toetra marobe, oh.: "Habe: rehetra", "Loko: mena".

trans-unit.source: To have a different title from the product name, enter it here.
trans-unit.target: Mba hananana lohateny samihafa avy amin'ny anaran'ny entana, ampidiro eto izany.

trans-unit.source: Public title for the product's page, and for search engines. Leave blank to use the product name. The number of remaining characters is displayed to the left of the field.
trans-unit.target: Ny lohateny ho an'ny pejin'ny entana, sy ny an'ny maotera fitadiavana. Avelao ho banga hampiasana ny anaran'ny entana. Ny isan'ny tarehin-tsoratra sisa tavela dia haseho amin'ny ankavia.

trans-unit.source: To have a different description than your product summary in search results pages, write it here.
trans-unit.target: Mba hananana famaritana samihafa nohon'ny famintinana ny entanao amin'ny pejy valin'ny fitadiavana, soraty eto izany.

trans-unit.source: Upload a brand logo from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Mampiakatra logo an'ny marika avy ao anaty solosaina.

trans-unit.source: Search name
trans-unit.target: Mitady anarana

trans-unit.source: Search category
trans-unit.target: Mitady sokajy

trans-unit.source: Search ref.
trans-unit.target: Mitady famantarana

trans-unit.source: Save the product and stay on the current page: ALT+SHIFT+S
trans-unit.target: Tahirizo ny entana ary mijanona amin'io pejy io: ALT+SHIFT+S

trans-unit.source: Permanently delete this product.
trans-unit.target: Fafana tanteraka ito entana ito.

trans-unit.source: Save and create a new product: ALT+SHIFT+P
trans-unit.target: Tahirizo ny entana ary mamorona entana vaovao: ALT+SHIFT+P

trans-unit.source: Search categories
trans-unit.target: Mitady sokajy

trans-unit.source: Where should the product be available on your site? The main category is where the product appears by default: this is the category which is seen in the product page's URL. Disabled categories are written in italics.
trans-unit.target: Aiza amin'ny sitanao no tokony hipetraka ny entana? Ao amin'ny sokajy tena izy no tokony haseho ny entana: ito no sokajy izay hita amin'ny URLn'ny pejin'ny entana. Ny sokajy tsy miasa dia voasoratra ho italika.

trans-unit.source: If you want to quickly create a new category, you can do it here. Don’t forget to then go to the Categories page to fill in the needed details (description, image, etc.). A new category will not automatically appear in your shop's menu, please read the Help about it.
trans-unit.target: Raha te hmorona sokajy vaovao haingana ianao, afaka ataonao eto izany. Aza adino avy eo ny mandeha amin'ny pejy Sokajy ary mameno ny antsipirihany ilaina (famaritana, sary, sns). Ny sokajy vaovao tsy mipoitra hoazy amin'ny fehi-drohin'ny fivarotanao, vakio aza fady ny Fanampiana momba an'izany.

trans-unit.source: Combinations are the different variations of a product, with attributes like its size, weight or color taking different values. To create a combination, you need to create your product attributes first. Go to Catalog > Attributes & Features for this!
trans-unit.target: Ny fitambarana dia fiovana samihafa amin'ny entana, miaraka amin'ny toetra ohatra ny habeny, ny lanjany na ny lokony izay mandray karazany samihafa. Mila mamorona toetran'entana mialoha ianao ahafahanao mamorona fitambarana. Mandehana amin'ny Katalaogy > Toetra & Endri-javatra noho izany!

trans-unit.source: You can specify supplier references according to previously associated suppliers.
trans-unit.target: Afaka mamaritra famantarana mpamatsy ianao araka ny mpamatsy nifandray teo aloha.

trans-unit.source: Upload a file from your computer (%maxUploadSize% max.)
trans-unit.target: Mampiakatra fisie avy anaty solosaina (%maxUploadSize% max.)

trans-unit.source: The minimum quantity required to buy this product (set to 1 to disable this feature). E.g.: if set to 3, customers will be able to purchase the product only if they take at least 3 in quantity.
trans-unit.target: Isa farafahakeliny ilaina ahafahana mividy an'ito entana ito (ataovy 1 raha tsy hampiasaina ito endri-javatra ito). Oh.: raha natao 3, afaka mividy ny entana ny mpanjifa raha toa ka naka telo isa farafahakeliny.

trans-unit.source: Combinations are the different variations of a product, with attributes like its size, weight or color taking different values. Does your product require combinations?
trans-unit.target: Ny fitambarana dia fiovana samihafa amin'ny entana, miaraka amin'ny toetra tahaka ny habeny, lanjany na ny lokony izay mandray sanda samihafa. Ny entanao ve mila fitambarana?

trans-unit.source: How many products should be available for sale?
trans-unit.target: Entana firy farafahakeliny no tokony hamidy?

trans-unit.source: Do you want to display this page?
trans-unit.target: Tianao haseho ve ito pejy ito?

trans-unit.source: Yes, I understand the risks
trans-unit.target: Eny, Azoko ny risika
